languages.text: {n}Чародей неприятно смеется.{/n} "Не утруждай мои уши своей напрасной ложью — я умею смотреть сквозь души, и в твоей я вижу лишь непонимание и страх".
{n}The sorcerer lets out a chilling laugh.{/n} "Save your feeble lies, for they are unworthy of my ears. I can see into the souls of mortals, and there is nothing in yours but confusion and fear."
languages.original_text: {n}Чародей неприятно смеется.{/n} "Не утруждай мои уши своей напрасной ложью — я умею смотреть сквозь души, и в твоей я вижу лишь непонимание и страх".

traits.speaker: DarkApostleMob

languages.text: {n}巫师发出了令人不寒而栗的大笑声。{/n}“还是省省你那些软弱无力的谎言吧，那些话根本不值得我听。我能看穿凡人的灵魂，而你的灵魂里只有困惑和恐惧。”
languages.original_text: {n}The sorcerer lets out a chilling laugh.{/n} "Save your feeble lies, for they are unworthy of my ears. I can see into the souls of mortals, and there is nothing in yours but confusion and fear."

traits.locale_text: {n}巫师发出了令人不寒而栗的大笑声。{/n}“还是省省你那些软弱无力的谎言吧，那些话根本不值得我听。我能看穿凡人的灵魂，而你的灵魂里只有困惑和恐惧。”
traits.speaker: DarkApostleMob

languages.text: {n}Le sorcier pousse un rire glaçant.{/n} « Et vous, épargnez-moi vos mensonges pitoyables ; ils sont indignes de mes oreilles. Je peux lire dans l'âme des mortels, et dans la vôtre, je ne vois que la confusion et la peur. »
languages.original_text: {n}The sorcerer lets out a chilling laugh.{/n} "Save your feeble lies, for they are unworthy of my ears. I can see into the souls of mortals, and there is nothing in yours but confusion and fear."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le sorcier pousse un rire glaçant.{/n} « Et vous, épargnez-moi vos mensonges pitoyables ; ils sont indignes de mes oreilles. Je peux lire dans l'âme des mortels, et dans la vôtre, je ne vois que la confusion et la peur. »
traits.speaker: DarkApostleMob

languages.text: {n}ソーサラーは背筋が凍るような笑いを漏らす。{/n}「わかりやすい嘘だ。聞く価値もない。俺は定命の者の魂を見抜くことができるが、お前の魂には混乱と恐怖しかない」
languages.original_text: {n}The sorcerer lets out a chilling laugh.{/n} "Save your feeble lies, for they are unworthy of my ears. I can see into the souls of mortals, and there is nothing in yours but confusion and fear."

traits.locale_text: {n}ソーサラーは背筋が凍るような笑いを漏らす。{/n}「わかりやすい嘘だ。聞く価値もない。俺は定命の者の魂を見抜くことができるが、お前の魂には混乱と恐怖しかない」
traits.speaker: DarkApostleMob

languages.text: {n}El hechicero suelta una risa heladora.{/n} «Ahórrate las mentiras, no son dignas de mis oídos. Veo las almas de los mortales y en la tuya solo hay miedo y confusión».
languages.original_text: {n}The sorcerer lets out a chilling laugh.{/n} "Save your feeble lies, for they are unworthy of my ears. I can see into the souls of mortals, and there is nothing in yours but confusion and fear."

traits.locale_text: {n}El hechicero suelta una risa heladora.{/n} «Ahórrate las mentiras, no son dignas de mis oídos. Veo las almas de los mortales y en la tuya solo hay miedo y confusión».
traits.speaker: DarkApostleMob

languages.text: {n}Der Hexer stößt ein markerschütterndes Lachen aus.{/n} "Spart Euch Eure erbärmlichen Lügen, denn sie sind meiner Ohren unwürdig. Ich sehe in die Seelen von Sterblichen, und in Eurer befindet sich nichts als Verwirrung und Furcht."
languages.original_text: {n}The sorcerer lets out a chilling laugh.{/n} "Save your feeble lies, for they are unworthy of my ears. I can see into the souls of mortals, and there is nothing in yours but confusion and fear."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Hexer stößt ein markerschütterndes Lachen aus.{/n} "Spart Euch Eure erbärmlichen Lügen, denn sie sind meiner Ohren unwürdig. Ich sehe in die Seelen von Sterblichen, und in Eurer befindet sich nichts als Verwirrung und Furcht."
traits.speaker: DarkApostleMob

languages.text: {n}Sahir, tüylerini diken diken eden bir kahkaha atıyor.{/n} "Asıl sen cılız yalanlarını kendine sakla, kulaklarıma layık değiller. Ölümlülerin ruhunun içini görebilirim, senin ruhunda da kafa karışıklığı ve korku dışında bir şey görmüyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}The sorcerer lets out a chilling laugh.{/n} "Save your feeble lies, for they are unworthy of my ears. I can see into the souls of mortals, and there is nothing in yours but confusion and fear."
